channel.title: Various Stuff on crashdot.com
channel.description: Recent content in Various Stuff on crashdot.com

item.title: Quick reference notes
item.description: Introduction # This is a page where I store quick notes and commands I sometimes need but always forget and end up having to search for on the web, which is not the most economic way to spend my time.

item.title: changes
item.description: Introduction # If you have been here before, you will have noticed some changes.

item.title: Why the F1 Academy is bad for women in racing
item.description: Introduction # Before the start of the 2023 F1 season, Formula 1 launched the F1 Academy initiative to be headed by Susie Wolf and get more girls into F1.
